Episodes.Title: Definitions
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: As Ted begins his new career as a professor and is about to meet his future wife, Lily forces Barney and Robin to have "the talk" and define their new relationship.

Episodes.Title: Double Date
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted goes on a blind date with the same woman he went on a blind date with seven years ago, and Barney and Marshall find Lily's stripper look-alike.

Episodes.Title: Robin 101
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Robin fears that Barney is cheating on her, she soon discovers that he is spending his evenings with Ted learning everything there is to know on how to date her

Episodes.Title: The Sexless Innkeeper
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Lily and Marshall realize that Robin and Barney are the perfect double-date friends, they try too hard to impress and come on too strong. Meanwhile, Ted gets a new nickname from Barney after an unsuccessful hook-up.

Episodes.Title: Duel Citizenship
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chuck Tatham
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: While Barney tries to convince Robin to become an American citizen, Ted and Marshall's fabled road trip takes a wrong turn when Marshall invites Lily.

Episodes.Title: Bagpipes
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Despite their best efforts to be the perfect couple, Barney's know-it-all attitude gets him in trouble with Robin and they are forced to ask Marshall and Lily for relationship advice.

Episodes.Title: The Rough Patch
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: After Barney and Robin hit a rough patch in their relationship, Lily devises the perfect plan to break them up, calling in help from Robin's famous friend, Alan Thicke.

Episodes.Title: The Playbook
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Barney hooks up with a woman Lily had been saving for Ted, she gets revenge by stealing his "playbook," which contains all the moves he uses to pick up women. But will Barney have the last laugh?

Episodes.Title: Slapsgiving 2: Revenge of the Slap
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney freaks out when Marshall bequeaths a "slap bet" slap to Ted and Robin. Meanwhile, Lily's estranged father shows up for Thanksgiving.

Episodes.Title: The Window
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Joe Kelly
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Maggie a girl next door Ted has wanted to date for years has suddenly broken up with her latest boyfriend, giving him and many other guys a chance to score with her.

Episodes.Title: Last Cigarette Ever
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Theresa Mulligan
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The gang struggles to quit smoking while Robin clashes with her new jaded co-worker.

Episodes.Title: Girls vs. Suits
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney chooses between wearing suits and sleeping with a sexy bartender. Meanwhile, Ted gets ever closer to meeting "the mother".

Episodes.Title: Jenkins
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Greg Malins
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Marshall finds out he's the "reacher" in his relationship with Lily and not the "settler," he considers pursuing a sexy and cool female coworker. Meanwhile, Ted finds out Robin is a drinking game for his architecture students.

Episodes.Title: Perfect Week
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Craig Gerard
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Barney is about to complete the perfect week - landing seven different girls in seven days - the gang roots him on in order to forget about their own miserable week.

Episodes.Title: Rabbit or Duck
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney runs into problems when he displays his cell phone number during the Super Bowl, Ted asks Marshall and Lily to arrange a marriage for him, and Robin thinks that her co-anchor has asked her out on a date.

Episodes.Title: Hooked
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When the gang tries to convince Ted that he is being strung along by Tiffany, they reflect about relationships where each of them has been in the same situation.

Episodes.Title: Of Course
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: After the guys discover that Robin deliberately got Barney hooked up with an incompatible female writer, they find out that that they didn't realize that Robin hasn't been handling their breakup very well.

Episodes.Title: Say Cheese
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted angers Lily when he brings a random date to her birthday party, so she is forced to remind him of all the other random women he has brought along to important functions, only to discover that they weren't "the one."

Episodes.Title: Zoo or False
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall comes up with a number of different outrageous and embarrassing stories to explain how he was mugged in Central Park, but which of his stories is the truth?

Episodes.Title: Home Wreckers
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted reacts to his mom's second wedding by making the capricious decision to buy his "dream house," while everyone tries to figure out whether Barney or Robin cried at the wedding.

Episodes.Title: Twin Beds
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Theresa Mulligan
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: As Robin contemplates moving in with her new boyfriend Don, Ted and Barney both decide that they want her back. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily think they've revolutionized modern marriage when they begin sleeping in separate beds.

Episodes.Title: Robots vs. Wrestlers
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney is worried that the old gang is falling apart when Ted blows off a "Wrestlers vs. Robots" competition so that he can stay at a snobby party.

Episodes.Title: The Wedding Bride
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted is livid when he discovers that the man Stella left Ted for at the altar wrote a blockbuster movie about the incident, and portrays Ted as the bumbling, mean-spirited bad guy.

Episodes.Title: Doppelgangers
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Robia Rashid
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall and Lily think they've spotted Barney's doppelganger, which means that they can start trying to have a baby, but it's really Barney in disguise. Meanwhile, Ted goes blonde and Robin considers taking an anchor job in Chicago.
